items.title: Fish Grilled With Lemon Garlic Butter Sauce
items.description: Enjoy grilled fish pieces that we catch ourselves, boneless and carefully marinated with our special swefish marinade, covered in a delicious creamy sauce of fresh butter, refreshing lemon and rich local garlic flavour. We also offer extra lemon, butter and garlic sauce for free. Choose the appropriate weight of fish from this variety.

items.title: Grilled Shrimp with Lemon Garlic Butter Sauce
items.description: Enjoy grilled shrimp with a delicious creamy sauce of fresh butter, refreshing lemon, local garlic flavor and special Swish seasoning. We offer extra butter, garlic and lemon sauce for free. Choose the appropriate weight of shrimp from this variety.

items.title: Fish Fillet Grilled With Olive Oil & Lemon
items.description: Enjoy the deliciousness of our own caught fish, boned and grilled with pure extra virgin olive oil and refreshing lemon juice. Suitable for Keto diet. Free portion of fresh grilled swefish vegetables seasoned with our special marinade. Choose the appropriate fish weight from this variety.

items.title: Shrimp Grilled With Olive Oil & Lemon
items.description: Healthy and keto-friendly grilled shrimp with pure extra virgin olive oil and refreshing lemon juice. Free portion of fresh grilled swefish vegetables seasoned with our special seasoning. Choose the appropriate shrimp weight from this item.

items.title: The Fish & Chips
items.description: Indulge in golden-brown, crispy, wild-caught, fresh fish fillets served with our farm-grown potatoes and a selection of house-made sauces for free! Choose the desired fish weight.

weightOptions.weight: 120 gm Fish Fillet (1 piece) + 2 Optional Sauces
250 gm Fish Fillet (2 pieces) + 2 Optional Sauces
480 gm Fish Fillet (4 pieces) + 4 Optional Sauces

items.title: The Shrimp & Chips
items.description: Fresh butterfly shrimp, lightly battered and deep-fried to a perfect golden-brown, served with our farm grown potatoes and complimentary sauces. Choose your desired shrimp weight.

items.title: Fried Fish Fillet
items.description: Golden-brown, wild-caught, fresh crispy fish fillet, expertly seasoned and cooked to perfection. Free selection of house-made sauces. Choose desired fish weight.

items.title: Fried Butterfly Shrimp
items.description: Crispy golden-brown butterfly fresh shrimp, prepared to perfection. Enjoy house-made sauces, crafted daily. Choose desired shrimp weight.

items.title: Shrimp Bisque Soup
items.description: An aromatic shrimp broth infused with garlic, leeks, celery and swefish's special spices.

items.title: Jalape√±o Mustard Crispy Fish Fillet
items.description: Crispy fish fillet meets fresh iceberg lettuce, pickled cucumbers, and jalapeno mustard sauce in fresh 5 oz round bread.

items.title: Offer 1
items.description: Jalapeno crispy fish fillet sandwich, fries packet and soft drink.

items.title: Fries Packet
items.description: Indulge in the crispiness of our chunky fries, cut from potatoes grown on our farms specifically for you and seasoned with SWEFISH's exclusive and unique spice blend.

items.title: Swefish Special Bread
items.description: Discover the taste of fresh white bread toasted with rich butter, aromatic local garlic, and fresh parsley.

items.title: SWEFISH Special Rice
items.description: Enjoy the delightful taste of our special rice, seasoned with a blend of our kitchen's secrets to complete your meal with a unique flavor.

items.title: SWEFISH Special Rice Large
items.description: Enjoy the delightful taste of our special rice, seasoned with a blend of our kitchen's secrets to complete your meal with a unique flavor.

items.title: Swefish Special Vegetables
items.description: Our grilled vegetables, seasoned with our special secret blend, including zucchini, carrots, bell peppers, and green beans.

items.title: Lemon Garlic Butter Sauce (Medium)
items.description: A perfectly balanced and creamy sauce blending the refreshing taste of lemon with the rich depth of butter and the strong flavor of our local garlic.

items.title: Lemon Garlic Butter Sauce (Large)
items.description: A perfectly balanced and creamy sauce blending the refreshing taste of lemon with the rich depth of butter and the strong flavor of our local garlic.

items.title: Sweet Chili
items.description: Our house-made sweet chili sauce blends the perfect balance of sweetness and spice from red chili peppers, honey, and vinegar.

items.title: Sriracha Tahini
items.description: Our tangy and creamy special sauce made with tahini, lemon juice, and a splash of sriracha red chili sauce for a spicy kick.

items.title: Roquefort Sauce
items.description: A creamy and flavorful house-made blue cheese sauce, made with mayonnaise, salt, and freshly cracked black pepper.

items.title: Cheddar Sauce
items.description: Our rich and buttery house-made cheddar sauce is crafted with local cheddar cheese and fresh milk.

items.title: Honey Mustard
items.description: A sweet and tangy specialty dipping sauce made with mustard, honey, mayonnaise, and lemon juice.

items.title: Capers Tartar Sauce
items.description: A classic tartar sauce with a briny twist, featuring finely chopped pickled gherkins, sweet pickle relish, dill, and imported capers. Our in-house recipe is a unique take on a traditional favorite.

items.title: Barbecue Sauce
items.description: Smoked barbecue sauce.

items.title: Coleslaw
items.description: Our classic freshly made coleslaw features shredded white cabbage and carrots tossed in a creamy house-made mayonnaise-based dressing.

items.title: Green Salad With Mustard Vinaigrette Dressing
items.description: Our refreshing green salad features a vibrant mix of cherry tomatoes, arugula, radish, and cucumber, tossed in our house-made mustard vinaigrette dressing ‚Äî for free!

items.title: Kids Meal
items.description: Our freshly caught fish nuggets, prepared with the finest ingredients and deep-fried in pure oil, are served with our perfectly cooked farm-grown potatoes and a side of ketchup, making it an irresistible meal for kids.
